the attempt, with the bill introduced by Michele Bachmann Mike Pence , to strip Planned Parenthood of the federal funding it receives for contraceptive and sex education services. Michele Bachmann already got in on this today, saying, Planned Parenthood performed 324,000 abortions in 2010. That should be enough reason to ensure that it never receives another taxpayer dollar from our government. ( Abortions are about 3 percent of Planned Parenthood's overall work.)
